Center.Question: What applies to you most?
Center.Application: I like to find out how I want to learn by doing
Center.Meaning: I want to investigate what kind of learning suites me best
Center.Productive: I want to determine how I learn all by myself

Top.Question: What would you like most?
Top.Productive: That I add value to society

TopRight.Question: Where would you go?
TopRight.Application: Where you can do fun activities
TopRight.Meaning: Where after some detective work it seems interesting
TopRight.Productive: Where no one has gone before

BottomRight.Question: When would you act?
BottomRight.Meaning: If I can see the point of it

Bottom.Question: What is your favorite challenge?
Bottom.Reproductive: If I can follow a storyline
Bottom.Productive: If I can come up with something myself

BottomLeft.Question: Which tool would you bring with you?
